headline: How Investors Are Reacting To APA (APA) Cutting Capital Spending While Maintaining Oil Output Targets
summary: During the second quarter of 2025, APA Corporation began reducing its Permian rig count from eight to six, reflecting improved drilling efficiency and leading to a capital expenditure forecast cut of US$130 million while maintaining steady oil production targets; the company declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.25 per share payable in November to shareholders of record as of October 22. This operational shift highlights an ongoing focus on capital efficiency and cost savings, underscoring...
